name: Nomads Sydney
description:
Welcome to Nomads Sydney – your perfect hub in the heart of the action! Located just a stone's throw away from Sydney's iconic Opera House and the majestic Harbour Bridge, Nomads Sydney offers you easy access to all the city's must-see attractions. With Darling Harbour nearby and Sydney Town Hall right across the street, you're in the prime spot to explore.

At Nomads Sydney, we've got accommodation options for everyone, whether you prefer shared rooms or private deluxe spaces. Our friendly reception team is available 24/7 to assist you, and you can even reach out to them through the convenient Goki app for any questions or concerns.

Don't miss out on the fun at our award-winning bar, The Scary Canary! Join us for nightly events like trivia nights and silent discos, where you can mingle with fellow travelers and enjoy good food and drinks.

Traveling solo or want to check out some of the sites with other travelers? Make sure to check out our free activities schedule that runs weekly for guests - it includes free pancake days, walks such as the Bondi to Coogee trail, or a traditional Aussie BBQ at the beach hosted by us!

Whether you're here for a quick getaway, to explore Sydney, or just to relax, Nomads Sydney has everything you need for a comfortable stay. We can't wait to welcome you and say G'day

Please remember: Nomads Sydney is for guests aged 18 and above, and we operate as a cashless property for your convenience. Don't forget to bring your valid passport for check-in as this is a requirement.

If you need a hand or have any questions, just contact our friendly team. We really appreciate your understanding and can’t wait to welcome you to our property.
hostelworldSays: Nomads Sydney is a good choice for those flying in to Sydney as it's just a short walk from the train going to and from the airport. It's also centrally located very near Darling Harbour and the Harbour Bridge. Many Hostelworld guests tell us they'd stay here again, based on the highly-praised travel info desk and the large rooms which feature comfy beds and spacious under-bed lockers. We like that this hostel has free events every day, such as "beach trips, yoga, running [and] VIP nights at local bars", according to our reviewers.
hostelSays:
We offer a bunch of extras and unique features here that really set us apart from other hostels. Our own amazing bar, Scary Canary, is open 'til late with different fresh and fun activities nightly. The free weekly activities include a free guided tour over Sydney Harbour Bridge and we've got a free beach BBQ which is held on the popular Coogee Beach. Upon check-in we provide a special Base guide to Sydney city, with special offers like Sydney Tower discounts, bridge climbing, aquarium and local food and drink specials, plus an all-you-need-to-know map of Sydney. Plus our guest service desk can provide you with tax back, bank account set-up and SIM card activations and we sell cell phones and calling cards. We offer disabled-friendly rooms and a disabled toilet for our special guest needs.
Only a few minutes away we have Sydney Harbour Bridge, the Opera House and Darling Harbour, where you can see a real koala and feed a kangaroo at Featherdale Zoo, but personally I tell people they have to go to Bondi. If you're up for surfing or swimming, Bondi Beach is place to go!! Only minutes walk away is the bus stop to get on to catch some serious waves.

groupInformation.terms: If a group want only their group in Dorm rooms they will be required to pay for each bed in that room. i.e. the group want 5 persons in a 6 person room they are required to pay for the 6th bed unless the hostel is at liberty to put other into that bed.
groupInformation.cancellationTerms: No Shows,Cancellations or room reductions within 2 weeks will be 100% non refundable
groupInformation.additionalTerms: A $200 security deposit will be required on checkin and will be refunded on checkout assuming the room is left in an acceptable state.

houseRules.notes:
Non refundable or last minute bookings are non cancelable, non exchangeable and non refundable whatever the reason for the cancellation. The total of the amount of the stay is debited from your card once the booking is received. 

Standard or flexible bookings can be Canceled or changed free of charge prior to 3pm on the day before your arrival date. The total of the amount of the stay will be debited from your card within 24 hours of your arrival date.

If the property is unable to charge the full amount to your nominated card we will attempt  to contact the customer asking for an alternative payment method. If this is unsuccessful it may result cancellation. 

Credit card payments to Hostels in Australia and New Zealand are subject to a transaction fee. The current fee is 2.19 % of the total transaction for Visa, 2.18 % for Mastercard, and 3.95 % for American Express. Fees may change and are confirmed at the time a charge is made.

This property does not accept any bookings for Schoolies, Hens or Bucks parties

This property considers a group to consist of 5 or more people travelling together - regardless of whether bookings are made collectively or individually. To minimise impacts to other guests, and to ensure you are adhering to our group policies it is recommended that you contact the property directly to make group bookings. Failure to do so may result in additional fees, requirements to pay for additional beds and we may not be able to guarantee beds are allocated into the same room - if it is felt that your group may impact the experience of other guests it may result in the cancellation of your reservation with full charges. 

This property is an 18+ venue.

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
